b7fec042-2ebd-4d9f-bace-9bfb2484ea08.content: DONE: Added node get, node status, node list-all commands. Fixed focus to score by direct tag match. Shared render across all node output. 53 tests passing.

271f89cc-b79a-4d95-bd18-b250dab02205.content: All inventory, status update, and query commands are implemented. Bank is self-hosting with all stories/features marked done. AGENTS.md has full command reference.
